body_html:
Ah, sorry, I didn't read the error message closely enough. I'd just try again -- it looks like bazel couldn't git clone the protobuf repository properly, possibly due to transient network issues. Nothing to do with cuda at all :)

If this isn't true, maybe worth trying to file a bug with bazel to make the error message more helpful, if it's not just a transient network problem.

body:
Ah, sorry, I didn't read the error message closely enough.  I'd just try again -- it looks like bazel couldn't git clone the protobuf repository properly, possibly due to transient network issues.  Nothing to do with cuda at all :)

If this isn't true, maybe worth trying to file a bug with bazel to make the error message more helpful, if it's not just a transient network problem.
